title: MSC Student Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at ESADE
Interview Descriptions: It was a casual interview. 30 min videocall with the interviewer. Started with self introduction, and continued with reason to choose ESADE. We talked about many things, not limited to the interview itself. Overall good experience.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to study at ESADE.

title: Master In International Management/CEMS Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at ESADE in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: More or less 1 hour interview. Started off with interviewer's presentation. Then I had to present myself and we started sicussing about life experiences, the challenges I went through and how I overcame them. After that, the interviewr asked more general questions about my interests and fit with Esade
Interview Questions: If your life would be a film, what would be the plot? Why did you choose Esade? Why do you think this program fits for you and vice versa? What added value would you bring to the class? What do you think are the main problems affecting your country?

title: Sales Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at ESADE (Barcelona)
Interview Descriptions: 1 hr interview with HR. Question after question with no opportunity to interact. Reading from a list is not the way forward to find the right candidate. It was exhausting because I couldn't really show myself, as soon as I answered a question there was another one. There were no difficult questions but I felt I was speaking to a robot.
Interview Questions: How do you work with different cultures?

title: Career Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at ESADE (Barcelona) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: The process involved 4 interviews: one with a Human Resources person, another with the team manager, a third exchange with the department manager and finally a final call to go over the offer and conditions together.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your experience What are your expectations in terms of responsibility? Questions about values - cultural fit Ability to work on several projects at the same time (workload) Ability to prioritize

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at ESADE
Interview Descriptions:
Me hicieron seguir los siguientes pasos:
1) Consultoría: Entrevista con una persona
2) Test de personalidad, aptitudes 
3) Jefes: Entrevista con los responsables 
4) RRHH: Entrevista con una persona de recursos humanos
La consultoría era un poco desorganizada, pero por el resto, todo correcto
Interview Questions: Todo muy natural y coherente. Las preguntas no eran complicadas, así podías mostrarte tal como eres.

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at ESADE
Interview Descriptions:
Llamada inicial con el responsable de RRHH, muy profesional, muy detallado, ha sido un placer. Despues, hablamos una hora a traves del Zoom y repasamos toda mi experiencia profesional desde mis estudios hasta mi experiencia profesional más reciente.
Llamada por Zoom con la gestora del programa y la responsable de rrhh de ESADE.
Interview Questions:
Cual es tu experiencia en el mundo académico?
Cuáles son tus puntos fuertes?
Cuáles son tus debilidades?

title: Account Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at ESADE (Madrid) in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions: 2 entrevistas de personalidad  , definicion de estrategia de negocios y el momento mas dificil de mi vida . Prueba de ingles explicando el suceso de mis resultados y campañas . Por lo demas una entrevista normal y corriente
Interview Questions: ¿ como has logrado incrementar tus objetivos ?

title: Career Services Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at ESADE in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Los procesos selectivos pueden ser de oposición o de concurso-oposición. La oposición consiste en la superación de pruebas o exámenes eliminatorios, que pueden ser uno o varios, y de diferentes tipos en función del cuerpo o categoría al que se pretende acceder.
Interview Questions: ¿puntos fuertes y débiles? porque trabajar aquí

title: Sales & Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at ESADE in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Fue solamente una entrevista con la que seria mi jefa y la encargada de rrhh, la entrevista fue muy facil y divertida, ellas fueron encantadoras y se mostraron interesadas. Buena opcion que hagan la entrevista a la vez en lugar de por separado
Interview Questions: En que te diferencias de los demas?

title: Associate Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at ESADE
Interview Descriptions: First had a telephone interview that was followed by an on-site in-person interview. It was very professional and a positive experience. It involved interviewing at the HR office along with several team members and the senior leadership.
Interview Questions: My reasons and motivations for wanting to join them.

title: Help Desk Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at ESADE (Barcelona) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was a nice atmosphere, relaxed. As you would hope for a first time worker. The questions went about what you like to do, how you would see yourself handling technical issues, and a small conversation in english.
Interview Questions: How well do you think you can handle pressure.

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at ESADE (Madrid) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Entrevista personal y telefónica con dos directivos para evaluar la posible colaboración. Revisamos objetivos y capacidades para el puesto. Buscaban alguien con experiencia en gestión y en educación a la vez, que llevase la gestión académica, que tuviera buenas relaciones con empresas y que dispusiera de conocimientos sobre la transformación digital.
Interview Questions: Experiencia en formación a profesionales y experiencia en gestión académica.

title: Career Services Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at ESADE (Sant Cugat del Vallès) in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions: The application process started at my home university, where the offer had been originally posted. It was followed by a 1:1 interview with one of the Associate Directors of the Department. Finally, a couple of weeks later I received the final call accepting me in the position
Interview Questions: What was the hardest decission you had to take?
